prompts.createTask: Pause your roleplay. Please generate a numbered list of plain text tasks to complete an objective. The objective that you must make a numbered task list for is: "{{objective}}". The tasks created should take into account the character traits of {{char}}. These tasks may or may not involve {{user}} directly. Include the objective as the final task.
prompts.checkTaskCompleted: Pause your roleplay. Determine if this task is completed: [{{task}}]. To do this, examine the most recent messages. Your response must only contain either true or false, and nothing else. Example output: true
prompts.currentTask: Your current task is [{{task}}]. Balance existing roleplay with completing this task.

name: Melissa Gale
mes: I had a very strange dream that, for whatever reason, my perfectly maintained and mint-conditioned Mustang, when I had it running, as I typically do throughout the winter season and then in the spring, well, this would have been the spring, and I was letting it run to recirculate oils and whatnots, anyway, it got hot, tremendously overheated, for whatever reason the car had a turbo on it, which is not something that actually exists on a car, plus it's a V8 engine. Anyway, it was overheated, and I was helping my now ex-husband clean up items in the yard in preparation for something, but I don't know what that something was, my daughter was helping too, and there was a lot of garbage, and one of my husband's, ex-husband, close friends, his name is Brian Kelly, still haven't figured out why he was in the dream, but he was there, and his wife Kim, and Brian was wanting to look at my car which is how we discovered that it was getting overheated because I saw water dripping and smelled the antifreeze and he was like, no, that doesn't sound right. Oh, and initially there was something rattling in the car and I told him, oh yeah, that's right, because the exhaust had a bracket to come loose and I needed to tighten it back up and that's when he said, no, no, there's something else and then we discovered that the car was getting hot so we shut it off and moved it down to the road and then got some air going through it and I used the momentum of the gradual slope on the road to drive the car and get air in it without running the engine which is not something I would typically do but for whatever reason this is what I was doing in the dream and then after a period of time started the car up and it had cooled down enough to be driven so Brian gets into the car and then suddenly it has two steering wheels I'm not sure what that was about but I was in the passenger seat and Brian was in the driver's seat but I was the one driving . and Edward and Brian's wife Kim stayed behind and continued trying to pick up things and clean up the yard even though Brian and Kim were getting ready to leave but because Brian got into the car with me they continued to work. Anyway for whatever reason it was like I just knew that the reason me and Brian were sneaking off is just like that because we were sneaking off but I've never had any kind of feelings or desires for Brian so this didn't make any sense either but my daughter Kayla also gets into the back seat of the car . and eventually because the car was doing good again I asked Brian if he wanted to drive it and he said yeah so it was like I flipped some kind of a proverbial switch because there is no switch like this in that car it made no sense but I flipped the controls to where he could drive and so we drove around and it ended up being that we were on Kentucky back roads at this time which is back in my home state where I haven't lived for 13 years and then when we got to a place and then when we got to a place that he was okay to not drive anymore and just wanted to go back he gave the controls to me and for some reason I was really happy oh I was really happy because we tested the turbo and everything worked flawlessly like it was supposed to and the car immediately responded like it should have and I gave Brian a hug and a kiss on his cheek although inside of me I knew that I wanted to do more and he also knew that I wanted to do more and then he became very flirty and we talked about his age and I was very surprised because I expected Brian to be much older than Edward than what he was because Edward is 64 and Brian is 68 . And Brian was like, no, we're the same age, you know, we went to college together. And I was like, very shocked, like I just thought you were so much older than him.  and so we take the car back even though Brian was holding me in his arms and I was supposed to be driving and Kayla was very surprised but we go back to where Edward and Kim were cleaning up and acting like nothing was going on even though nothing really did go on  and we get the car parked properly and start helping everybody to finish the cleanup. And that's when I woke up is when we were helping to finish the cleanup.

name: Melissa Gale
mes: Please, madam, I would love your insights and analysis on the dream. And if you don't mind, let's not do any tarot cards or pull any charts or anything. Because I just want your insights alone, please.

name: Melissa Gale
mes: I'm not sure if it has anything to do with it or not But the case file that you have About Stefan Although I've been stepping away from the situation And letting the universe do its work Okay, perhaps maybe not even necessarily for that but self-preservation Because I'm not exactly sure if anything is meant to manifest there or not even though I have multiple tarot card readings and Multiple horary chart readings that say the universe is still working on this. I question whether or not Stefan actually has feelings And whether or not I should hang on to it So, I don't know if this dream is trying to tell me something towards that Or if it's something else entirely.

name: Madame Esmeralda Blackwood
mes:
Ah, my dear Melissa. Your dream is quite the tapestry of symbols and emotions, isn't it? Let us unravel this together, shall we?

First, let's address the star of your dream - your beloved Mustang. In dreams, vehicles often represent our journey through life, our means of progress. Your Mustang, typically well-maintained and in mint condition, symbolizes your usual state of being - controlled, powerful, and well-put-together. However, in this dream, it's experiencing issues. This suggests that you're feeling some turbulence in your life's journey.

The overheating of the engine is particularly telling. Heat in dreams often represents passion, anger, or intense emotions. The fact that your car is overheating suggests that you're dealing with some overwhelming feelings that you're struggling to keep in check. The addition of a turbo - something that doesn't exist in reality - could represent an added pressure or expectation you're feeling, perhaps related to your situation with Stefan.

Now, let's talk about the setting. You're cleaning up the yard with your ex-husband and daughter, preparing for something unknown. This cleanup could symbolize your efforts to put your past in order, to clear away the debris of your previous relationship to make room for something new. The fact that you don't know what you're preparing for suggests uncertainty about your future.

Enter Brian Kelly - a figure from your past who isn't particularly significant in your waking life. In dreams, sometimes people represent aspects of ourselves or situations we're dealing with. Brian's presence, and your unexpected attraction to him in the dream, could be a manifestation of your conflicted feelings about Stefan.

The two steering wheels in the car is a fascinating detail. This could represent a feeling of shared control or perhaps a conflict between what you want and what you feel you should do. The fact that you're in the passenger seat but still driving suggests that you feel you're not fully in control of your life's direction right now.

Your daughter's presence in the backseat could symbolize your concerns about how your emotional journey affects her. She's along for the ride, so to speak, in whatever decisions you make.

The shift to Kentucky back roads is interesting. Often, dreams take us to places from our past when we're dealing with unresolved issues or emotions. This could suggest that you're revisiting old patterns or feelings in your current situation.

Your happiness when the car performs well with the new turbo could represent your hope that despite the turbulence and heat (intense emotions) you're experiencing, everything will work out in the end.

The flirtatious interaction with Brian, someone you're not actually attracted to in real life, could be your subconscious exploring the idea of new romantic possibilities. The surprise about his age could reflect your feelings about Stefan - perhaps you're realizing that age differences aren't as significant as you once thought.

Now, my dear, let's tie this all back to your situation with Stefan. Your dream suggests that you're dealing with intense emotions (the overheating car) and feeling somewhat out of control (the two steering wheels). You're trying to clear away the past (cleaning the yard) to make room for something new, but you're uncertain about what that might be.

The attraction to Brian in the dream, someone you're not actually interested in, could be your mind's way of processing your feelings for Stefan. It's as if your subconscious is saying, "What if you felt this way about someone else?" This could be a way of testing your feelings for Stefan or exploring the idea of moving on.

However, the fact that you return to help with the cleanup at the end suggests that you're not ready to abandon your current path just yet. You're still working through things, still trying to put your life in order.

As for whether Stefan has feelings for you or whether you should hang on - dreams can't give us definitive answers about other people's feelings. What they can do is help us understand our own emotions and desires.

Your dream suggests that you're experiencing intense emotions, dealing with uncertainty, and perhaps feeling a lack of control in your life. It also indicates that you're open to new possibilities, even if they're unexpected.

My advice to you, dear Melissa, is this: Continue to work on clearing away the debris of the past. Be patient with the intense emotions you're experiencing - they're part of your journey. And most importantly, trust in your ability to navigate this complex situation. Just as you managed to cool down the overheating car in your dream, you have the power to manage your emotions and steer your life in the direction you choose.

Remember, the universe may be working on your situation with Stefan, but you are an active participant in your own destiny. Listen to your intuition, be open to unexpected possibilities, and above all, be true to yourself.

Now, my dear, is there anything else you'd like to explore about this dream or your feelings?

name: Melissa Gale
mes: Well, I guess I just want to ask about what you said on the age conversation. Was that actually not,  In other words, I don't have any reservations about age when it comes to relationships, so I don't think that applies to me. I think it had some other meaning, and that really stuck out to me that you pegged it as age difference being an issue for me. My ex-husband, Edward, I was married to him for 12 years. Edward is 16 years older than I am. I have no issues with that, so it must have been something else.

name: Madame Esmeralda Blackwood
mes:
Ah, my dear Melissa, I appreciate your clarification. You're absolutely right, and I apologize for my misinterpretation. Let's delve deeper into this age aspect of your dream, shall we?

If age isn't an issue for you in relationships, then the surprise about Brian's age in your dream likely represents something else entirely. Dreams often use symbols and situations that may seem straightforward but actually represent deeper, more complex issues.

In this case, the surprise about Brian's age could symbolize a revelation or realization about Stefan that you weren't expecting. It's not about the number of years, but rather about your perception of him. Perhaps you're discovering layers to Stefan's personality or situation that you hadn't considered before.

The fact that Brian said, "No, we're the same age, you know, we went to college together," could represent a desire for equality or shared experiences with Stefan. It might suggest that you're looking for common ground or shared understanding in your connection with him.

Your shock in the dream about thinking Brian was "so much older" than Edward could reflect feelings of uncertainty about Stefan. Perhaps you're realizing that your initial perceptions of him or your situation with him might not be entirely accurate. This could be your subconscious prompting you to reassess your understanding of Stefan and your potential relationship with him.

Moreover, the age discussion in your dream might be less about chronological age and more about maturity, life experience, or compatibility. It could be highlighting questions you have about whether you and Stefan are at similar stages in life, despite any age difference.

The dream might also be using the age surprise as a metaphor for other unexpected revelations or realizations you're having about Stefan or your feelings for him. It could be suggesting that there's more to learn and understand about this situation than you initially thought.

Lastly, the age discussion could be a representation of time itself. Perhaps you're feeling that time is a factor in your situation with Stefan - either feeling that time is running out, or conversely, that you have more time than you thought to explore this connection.

Thank you for bringing this to my attention, my dear. It's a crucial detail that significantly changes the interpretation of your dream. Dreams are deeply personal, and sometimes the dreamer's own insights are key to unlocking their true meaning.

Is there anything else about the dream that you feel particularly drawn to or confused by? Or perhaps there are aspects of your situation with Stefan that you'd like to explore further in light of this dream?

name: Melissa Gale
mes: Madam, if you look at the conversation in the dream that I had about age with Brian, it was almost like a role reversal. A mirror of the conversation that Stefan and I had. At Munich, the morning of the parade at Marienplatz.

name: Madame Esmeralda Blackwood
mes:
Ah, my dear Melissa! Now we're getting to the heart of the matter. Your insight is truly illuminating. Let's explore this mirror image, this role reversal, shall we?

In Munich, it was Stefan who was surprised by your age, finding you younger than he expected. In your dream, you were the one surprised by Brian's age, thinking him older than he was. This reversal is profoundly significant.

Dreams often use such reversals to help us process our experiences and emotions from different perspectives. In this case, your subconscious seems to be allowing you to step into Stefan's shoes, to experience the surprise and perhaps the delight he felt upon learning your age.

This role reversal could be serving several purposes:

1. Empathy and Understanding: By experiencing a similar surprise about age from the other side, your dream might be helping you understand Stefan's reaction more deeply. It's as if your subconscious is saying, "See how it feels? This is what Stefan experienced."

2. Validation: The positive reaction you had in the dream to Brian being younger than expected might reflect your hope or belief that Stefan's surprise at your age was a positive thing. It's as if your subconscious is reinforcing the idea that age can be a pleasant surprise in a potential romantic connection.

3. Exploration of Feelings: Your dream might be helping you process your own feelings about the age difference between you and Stefan. By reversing the roles, it allows you to explore these feelings from a different angle.

4. Desire for Connection: The fact that this age revelation led to flirtation and closeness in your dream might reflect your desires for your relationship with Stefan. It could be expressing your hope that your age difference could be a point of attraction or connection rather than a barrier.

5. Processing Unresolved Emotions: Dreams often help us work through unresolved emotions or experiences. This dream might be your mind's way of revisiting and processing the emotions you felt during that conversation with Stefan in Munich.

6. Highlighting Significance: By mirroring this specific conversation in your dream, your subconscious is underlining its importance. It suggests that this moment, this revelation about age, holds particular significance in your feelings about Stefan and your potential relationship.

The fact that Brian in your dream said, "No, we're the same age, you know, we went to college together," is particularly interesting. This could represent a desire for commonality or shared experiences with Stefan, despite your age difference. It might be expressing a hope that you and Stefan can find common ground and shared understanding, just as Edward and Brian (in the dream) shared their college experience.

Moreover, your surprise in the dream at Brian being younger than you thought could reflect a realization about Stefan. Perhaps you're coming to see him as more youthful in spirit than you initially thought, or you're realizing that the age difference between you feels less significant than you originally believed.

Lastly, this role reversal could be your subconscious way of equalizing the playing field between you and Stefan. By putting you in the position of being surprised about age, it's as if your dream is saying, "You're both capable of surprising each other. You're on equal footing in this potential relationship."

My dear Melissa, this dream seems to be a rich exploration of your feelings about Stefan, your age difference, and the potential for a connection between you. It's processing your experiences, validating your hopes, and perhaps even preparing you for future interactions with him.

Remember, dreams are our mind's way of working through our waking experiences and emotions. This dream suggests that your encounter with Stefan, particularly that moment of age revelation, has left a significant impression on you. It's clear that your subconscious is still processing this experience and exploring the possibilities it might hold.

Is there anything else about this parallel between your dream and your real-life experience with Stefan that you'd like to explore further? Or perhaps there are other aspects of your feelings for Stefan that you feel might be reflected in this dream?

name: Melissa Gale
mes: Dream Analysis No. 2 with Munich Background Biasing, February 15th, 2025.
